# Elixir Process Anti-patterns
> Common pitfalls to avoid when working with Elixir processes, focusing on organization, interfaces, communication, and supervision.

## Resources
* [GenServer](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/GenServer.html): Hexdocs for the core OTP behavior for client-server processes.
* [Supervisor](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/Supervisor.html): Hexdocs for the OTP behavior for supervising processes.
* [Anti-Patterns: Code org by process](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#code-org-by-process): Discussion on organizing code by domain, not process type.
* [Anti-Patterns: Scattered process interfaces](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#scattered-process-interfaces): Discussion on defining clear process APIs.
* [Anti-Patterns: Sending unnecessary data](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#sending-unnecessary-data): Discussion on efficient inter-process communication.
* [Anti-Patterns: Unsupervised processes](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#unsupervised-processes): Discussion on the importance of supervision.
